Literature.Title: Combined Bioinformatic and Rational Design Approach To Develop Antimicrobial Peptides against Mycobacterium tuberculosis.
Literature.Author: Pearson CS, Kloos Z, Murray B, Tabe E, Gupta M, Kwak JH, Karande P, McDonough KA, Belfort G

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium tuberculosis mc2-6020(MIC=8µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis mc2-6230(MIC=32µM),Mycobacterium smegmatis(MIC=16µM),Mycobacterium bovis BCG(MIC=32µM),Streptococcus pyogenes(MIC=4µM),Streptococcus agalactiae(MIC=8µM),Streptococcus mutans(MIC=8µM),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=32µM),Bacillus subtilis BGSC 1A1(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=68µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=68µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(no activity data)
